sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-list-item>
    <v-card class="elevation-3 rounded-lg" flat>
      <v-row>
        <!-- Coluna com título e descrição -->
        <v-col cols="12">
          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title class="subtitle-1">{{ task.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            <v-list-item-subtitle class="body-1">{{ task.description }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-card>
  </v-list-item>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'TaskCard',
  props: {
    task: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.elevation-3 {
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 6px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0px 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,0.07);
}

.rounded-lg {
  border-radius: 12px; /* Ajuste o raio conforme necessário */
}

.subtitle-1, .body-1 {
  color: #424242; /* Ajuste a cor conforme necessário */
}
</style>
